item.title: Best Kodi Add ons [Reviewed & Updated for 2024]
item.description:
In this article, we present the most effective Kodi add-ons available for movies and television shows, sports and replays, streaming TV (IPTV), anime and cartoons, adults and many others. This list is continuously updated as we test Kodi Addons from time to time. The top Kodi add-ons could be different over time.

The add-ons listed here can be used for Kodi 21 Omega, Kodi 20 Nexus (up to Kodi 20.5) and Kodi 19 Matrix (up to Kodi 19.5). They can be used on any hardware that you can install Kodi on, such as Fire TV Stick 4K Max, Fire TV Stick 4K Max, Fire TV Stick, Fire TV Cube, Nvidia Shield TV, Android tablets and smartphones, Android TV boxes, Windows computers, and Apple Mac devices.

Be aware that Kodi add-ons are no cost. The developers spend their free time improving the Kodi experience. This means Kodi add-ons could not work at night.

Koditricks.com is not associated with the makers of Kodi addons. We have no control over the contents of Kodi add-ons, and we do not recommend that our users take action for any kind of copyright violation.

Attention: Protect Your Privacy Online

Be aware that streaming videos may be prohibited in your specific country. Online privacy protection is becoming more essential. We suggest using the use of a VPN. A VPN safeguards your online activity and prevents your service provider and other authorities from scrutinizing your online activities.

Through the use of a VPN, you can also alter your address so that you can gain access to services not available at the place you reside.

We suggest using the most reliable Kodi VPN for 2024.

  • ProtonVPN: The most efficient way to increase your speed.
  • Access VPN for Privacy Access VPN: The best choice for those with a tight budget.
  • Surfshark VPN: Great for usability.
  • NordVPN: Best for average speeds.
  • CyberGhost VPN is the best VPN for a long trial period.

Koditricks.com is not associated with the creators of Kodi addons. We have no control over the contents of Kodi addons, nor do we recommend that our users take action against copyright violations.

Best ALL-IN-ONE Kodi Addons

1. The Crew

The crew Kodi add-on can be described as a well-known all-in-one add-on that has been available for a long time. The Crew includes several sections of video content, including Movies, Television Shows, Sports, IPTV, Kids and other categories. It’s one of the best and most stable add-ons available, with lots of video content.

1
2

Repository: The Crew Repository
Source URL: https://team-crew.github.io

How I Install The Crew Kodi Addon

2. Ghost

The Ghost Kodi Addon is available again in the form of a Shadow fork located in the Crew Repository. The add-on is all-in-one and includes sections for TV programs, live TV shows, sports replays, and many other categories. Ghost is scouring the internet for content. It provides playlists with a single click as well as categories.

1
2

Repository: The Crew Repository
Source URL: https://team-crew.github.io

How do I download and install Ghost Kodi Addon?

3. The Lab

Lab Kodi Addon Lab Kodi Addon is an all-in-one add-on that is part of The Lab Repository. It comes with a variety of categories and sections to pick from. The categories comprise Movies and TV Shows, New Episodes, New Movies, 1-Click Movies, IPTV & Sports and numerous others. The lab has a playlist that can be played with one click of content. It is also able to search for video sources.

1
2

Repository: The Lab Repository
Source URL: https://th3l48.github.io/TheLab/

How do I install the Lab Kodi addon?

4. Asgard

Asgard Kodi Addon Asgard Kodi Addon is a popular, all-in-one addon with sections dedicated to television shows, movies, and sports replays, as well as videos for kids and documentaries. There are plenty of categories and sections that you can explore. If you don’t have Debrid access, there’s also a functional “Non Debrid Section” for videos. To get the best from this extension, be sure you are using Real Debrid or another similar service.

How do I set up Asgard Kodi. Addon

5. Dynasty

Dynasty Kodi Addon Dynasty Kodi Addon is a complete add-on located inside the Warehouse Repository. Dynasty is a huge repository with lots of content available to explore. Its sections include movies, TV shows, IPTV & Sports, Documentaries, music, kids and much more. The add-on can be used to crawl sources for video content. It also offers a variety of playlists and content that can be accessed via 1-click.

How do I Install the Dynasty Kodi Addon

6. M-E-T-V

The M-E.T.V Kodi Addon is an all-in-one addon available inside the EzzerMacs Wizard Repository. The categories include TV, Movies, sports, individuals, Children, track and other categories. Most categories are playlists featuring one-click videos and hyperlinks. Certain sections include live streams, too.

How do I install the M-E -T-V Kodi addon

7. Gratis

The Gratis Kodi Addon provides a variety of videos. The sections comprise Latest Movies, Live Sports, Live Channels, Sports Replays and much more. The addon can be found within the Funstersplace Repository. The links are completely absolutely free and do not require Debrid’s service. Menu layouts are simple and easy to navigate.

How do I set up Gratis Kodi Addon?

8. Fido

Fido Kodi Addon Fido Kodi Addon is an all-in-one addition that can be found within the Fido Repository. Fido includes a variety of playlists with one-click functionality and the ability to search different sources for videos. This is among the few add-ons that can provide free links. Sections comprise live TV, music TV, movies, kids’ area TV box sets, and other features.

How do I Install the Fido Kodi addon?

9. Nemesis AIO

The Nemesis AIO Kodi Addon is an all-in-one addon that provides different kinds of videos. The sections include TV shows, Live Sports & Replays, Documentaries, Cartoons, and numerous others. Nemesis has special features, like a watch party function and an adult-only section that is protected by a password you can create by yourself. Make sure you have a PIN number to gain access to the add-on. After you start the addon, the addon, a pop-up window will appear contains all the information required.

How do I Install Nemesis’s AIO Kodi Addon

10. UK Turk Playlists

It is the UK Turk Playlist. Kodi Addon is a well-loved all-in-one movie addon that works together with the Kodi 19 Matrix. There are a variety of categories and sections to pick from, such as television shows, live TV documentaries, Turkish sports television, Turkish movies, and many more. Instead of scrapers, this add-on displays the videos in playlists, which means you just need only two clicks to begin the playback. UK Turk comes with a large amount of content. Through our screenshots in this article, you can get a sense of how complete the add-on is.

How do I Install UK Turk’s Playlists Kodi addon?

Best Kodi Add Ons for MOVIES & TV SHOWS

1. Netflix

Through this Netflix Kodi Addon, you can access video content from all of the world’s top streaming services. There are many categories to pick from, including the latest releases, top picks as well as popular content. This add-on requires an active Netflix subscription. It won’t operate without one.

How do I Install Netflix Kodi Addon

2. Disney Plus (Disney+)

Through this Disney Plus Kodi Addon (Disney+), you can access all the content on Disney Plus. Disney Plus streaming service. Disney Plus is a subscription-based service that streams video on demand provided by The Walt Disney Company. It is a subscription-based service that allows access to all Disney productions, including Pixar, Marvel, Fox and National Geographic content. The most popular TV show is The Mandalorian, the complete Star Wars franchise, and all Marvel movies such as The Avengers, X-Men, The Simpsons and much more.

How do I Install the Disney Plus Kodi Addon

3. Hulu

Hulu is a well-known American streaming service that has a lot of programming to enjoy. By using the Hulu Kodi Addon, you get access to all films, television shows, movies, live TV channels, and sports programs through Your Kodi Media Center. Take note that a Hulu account that has an active subscription is necessary. At the moment, Hulu is accessible only by using a US IP address. If you’re not within the United States, you might have to use the VPN service.

How do I Install Hulu Kodi Addon

4. Tubi TV

Its Tubi TV Kodi Addon offers more than 50,000 films or TV series. While Tubi TV doesn’t offer the latest movies and shows, it does have a huge library of popular and lesser-known movies you can’t get with an alternative Kodi addon. Additionally, there is a wide selection of content that specializes in your preferences. This service is free and legal. It is financed through non-skippable advertising during the stream.

How do I set up Tubi TV Kodi Addon?

5. Fen

Its Fen Kodi Addon is a robust and light addon that allows video content to be streamed on the internet. Fen includes support for Real Debrid (cached torrents), Easynews (Usenet provider) and Furk (storage provider), which makes it distinctive. Fen is among the most efficient add-ons available, and it scrapes extremely quickly while pulling many high-quality hyperlinks. If you’re an Easynews or Furk client, you can type your login details into the settings for your add-on.

How do I set up Fen Kodi Addon?

6. Fen Light

This Fen Light Kodi addon is a smaller variant of the initial Fen Kodi addon. The primary focus is extremely fast performance. So, certain functions have been omitted from the program, which many Kodi users generally do not require. However, basic features like assistance for Debrid applications, EasyNews or Trakt are not gone.

How do I Install the Fen Light Kodi Addon

7. Umbrella

This Umbrella Kodi Addon is a Venom fork and is working excellently. It is equipped with the identical features of the original, which means Umbrella has extremely fast scraping speeds and supports various premium services like EasyNews as well as Furk and a variety of sections to pick from. Umbrella releases updates often, which makes it among the most popular video add-ons available for Kodi.

How to install Umbrella Kodi Addon

8. Seren

Its Seren Kodi add-on is currently the best option for high-quality video content streaming. Seren is a brand-new Kodi addon that is extremely fast and smooth and has a wide range of options to improve your experience. In our complete Seren Kodi addon tutorial, we will also teach you how to set the right settings to get the best from Seren.

How do I Install and set up Seren Kodi Addon?

9. Scrubs V2

It’s back! Scrubs V2 Kodi Addon is back and is now using the Kodi 19 Matrix. Scrubs V2 provides video content such as television shows and movies. This add-on is unique because it has free links, and no Debrid service is needed. Its menu layout is easy and simple. The add-on includes several scrapers that you can enable and deactivate within the settings. Additionally, there’s a bonus section named “More Stuff” with some extra functionalities.

How do I Install the Scrubs Version 2 Kodi Addon

10. POV

It is the POV Kodi Addon, which is a Fen fork located within the Kodifitzwell Repository. The categories comprise Movies, TV Shows, Popular People, Search, Discover and more. Presently, POV is running very quickly, just like Fen’s predecessor. Fen. It’s also among the few add-ons that support Offcloud.

How do I install the POV Kodi Addon?

Its Ezra Kodi Addon is a Fen fork that can scrape various sources for videos, including TV and movies. Similar to Fen, its overall speed, particularly the speed of scraping Ezra, is incredibly quick. It also supports Real Debrid, Easynews and Furk. Ezra is still in its initial stages. However, it is already working without problems. While Fen is back in operation, Ezra is a viable alternative.

How do I install the Ezra Kodi Addon?

Best Kodi Add Ons for SPORTS

1. Sport HD

The Sport HD Kodi Addon is the sequel to the popular Sport 365 addon. It was created and developed by the same person who designed it and is running exceptionally well. The streams available are sourced exclusively from a particular website, the name of which you will find within the description for the add-on. Live sports are available in a section that includes daily events and the time of their start.

How do I set up the Sport HD Kodi Addon?

2. Rising Tides

Rising Tides Kodi Addon Rising Tides Kodi Addon is an extremely useful instrument for watching live sports. Its focus is on European soccer and football from England. Additionally, Rising Tides comes with sections for live events such as NBA, UFC, wrestling, and much more. In this tutorial, we will guide you through the step-by-step steps to set up Rising Tides Kodi Addon. Rising Tides Kodi Addon.

How do I install the Rising Tides Kodi Addon?

How do I Install the DaddyLive Kodi Addon

FAQs - what people ask

Are Kodi addons free?

Absolutely, Kodi addons are free to download. They typically offer free content, including live TV, movies, television shows, as well as music and sports. Some, however, require a monthly subscription from an online television provider, streaming service, or even a premium host like Real Debrid.

What is the most effective one-stop Kodi Addon?

There are a variety of amazing all-in-one Kodi add-ons available, including Asgard, The Crew, Nemesis, and  M-E-T-V. The Crew is, however, It is the Crew can be the most well-known and reliable.

Which addons can you download for Kodi?

Installing an addon for Kodi involves a series of steps. This includes finding the repository URL, altering Kodi settings to allow non-official add-ons, and then installing the add-on via its repository. We’ve provided links to individual instructions for installing each Kodi add-on on this list.

Are Kodi addons legal?

Although Kodi is an official media player, a few add-ons have serious legal issues. The official Kodi addons, which are hosted by Kodi’s Official Repository Kodi Official Repository, are 100% legal. However, we cannot confirm the legality of third-party add-ons. Always make use of a VPN to conceal your online activity when you stream on these add-ons.

What is the reason why certain Kodi add-ons aren’t working?

Kodi add-ons might not perform due to various reasons. They could be incompatible versions of the Kodi version, outdated versions of the source, not being available, or inattention by developers. It is possible to check with other Kodi users on online forums or websites like FireStickTricks.com to find out if a Kodi add-on has stopped working.

Last words

Here is our collection of the most popular Kodi add-ons for TV shows, movies, sports, live TV, and many more. These add-ons are compatible with Kodi 21 and Kodi 20. Some of them are fully compatible with Kodi 19 and Kodi 18.
